alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN LOUP AND CENTRAL GARFIELD COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 422 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burwell, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Burwell around 425 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Deverre, Homestead Knolls Campground, and Virginia Smith Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Nebraska.
